onscreen_description.last_approved_text: At the heart of the Elven homeland the Great Vortex coils, syphoning the excess magic that spills from the Realm of Chaos; but now, after many millennia, it falters. The Vortex is vulnerable and while some seek to control its great power, others see an opportunity, a chance to prosper and vanquish foes in an unstable, war-ravaged world. Choose a Legendary Lord, fight for all that they desire and lead them to glory!

campaign_map_playable_areas.onscreen_description: At the heart of the Elven homeland the Great Vortex coils, syphoning the excess magic that spills from the Realm of Chaos; but now, after many millennia, it falters. The Vortex is vulnerable and while some seek to control its great power, others see an opportunity, a chance to prosper and vanquish foes in an unstable, war-ravaged world. Choose a Legendary Lord, fight for all that they desire and lead them to glory!

onscreen_description.last_approved_text: An age of conquest is upon us! Ready your armies and fortify your strongholds as war rages on every continent touched by the Great Ocean. Choose a Lord of Legend and ensure your mortal empire reigns supreme over the myriad factions ranged against you. This is the greatest test of generalship and statecraft thus far; will you restore the world to lasting order or revel in its ultimate destruction?
